translations: 阿努比斯 （埃及神话中的死神、丧葬之神）

sentences.sentence: Hafez: I don't know any Johnny. We are looking for the bracelet of Anubis.
sentences.translation: 哈菲兹：我不认识什么约翰尼，我们在找阿奴比斯的手镯。

sentences.sentence: Jonathan: Oh good, good for you good thing to have the old bracelet of Anubis.
sentences.translation: 乔纳森：哦，好啊，你有阿奴比斯的古老的手镯。

sentences.sentence: The Anubis Gates. Tim Powers. A modern scholar gets caught up in time travel, body- swapping, swashbuckling, and sorcery in London, circa 1810. Thing Charles Dickens meets Indiana Jones.
sentences.translation: 一位现代学者实现了时间旅行，变更了身份、神气活现地享受着1810年伦敦的魅力。如同查理斯·狄更斯遇到了印地安那·琼斯。
